verses.verse: My <S%H1121>son<s%>, if thou wilt <S%H3947>receive<s%> my <S%H561>words<s%>, And <S%H6845>lay<s%> up my commandments with <S%H4687>thee<s%>;
So as to <S%H7181>incline<s%> thine <S%H241>ear<s%> unto <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, And <S%H5186>apply<s%> thy <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H8394>understanding<s%>;
Yea <S%H7121><s%>, if thou cry after <S%H998>discernment<s%>, And lift <S%H5414>up<s%> thy <S%H6963>voice<s%> for <S%H8394>understanding<s%>;
If thou <S%H1245>seek<s%> her as <S%H3701>silver<s%>, And <S%H2664>search<s%> for her as for hid <S%H4301>treasures<s%>:
Then shalt thou <S%H995>understand<s%> the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, And <S%H4672>find<s%> the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.
For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>; Out of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> cometh <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> and <S%H1847>understanding<s%>:
He layeth <S%H6845>up<s%> sound <S%H8454>wisdom<s%> for the <S%H3477>upright<s%>; He is a <S%H4043>shield<s%> to them that <S%H1980>walk<s%> in <S%H8537>integrity<s%>;
That he may <S%H5341>guard<s%> the <S%H734>paths<s%> of <S%H4941>justice<s%>, And <S%H8104>preserve<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of his <S%H2623>saints<s%>.
Then shalt thou <S%H995>understand<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> and <S%H4941>justice<s%>, And <S%H4339>equity<s%>, <S%H2896>yea<s%>, every good <S%H4570>path<s%>.
For <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into thy <S%H3820>heart<s%>, And <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> shall be <S%H5276>pleasant<s%> unto thy <S%H5315>soul<s%>;
Discretion <S%H4209><s%> shall <S%H8104>watch<s%> over <S%H8394>thee<s%>; Understanding shall keep <S%H8104>thee<s%>:
To <S%H5337>deliver<s%> thee from the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%>, From the <S%H376>men<s%> that <S%H1696>speak<s%> perverse <S%H8419>things<s%>;
Who <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H734>paths<s%> of <S%H3476>uprightness<s%>, To <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness<s%>;
Who <S%H8056>rejoice<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>, And <S%H1523>delight<s%> in the <S%H8419>perverseness<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%>;
Who are <S%H6141>crooked<s%> in their <S%H734>ways<s%>, And <S%H3868>wayward<s%> in their <S%H4570>paths<s%>:
To <S%H5337>deliver<s%> thee from the <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%>, Even from the <S%H5237>foreigner<s%> that <S%H2505>flattereth<s%> with her <S%H561>words<s%>;
That <S%H5800>forsaketh<s%> the <S%H441>friend<s%> of her <S%H5271>youth<s%>, And <S%H7911>forgetteth<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of her <S%H430>God<s%>:
For her <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H7743>inclineth<s%> unto <S%H4194>death<s%>, And her <S%H4570>paths<s%> unto the <S%H7496>dead<s%>;
None that <S%H935>go<s%> unto her return <S%H7725>again<s%>, Neither do they <S%H5381>attain<s%> unto the <S%H734>paths<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>:
That thou mayest <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8104>men<s%>, And keep the <S%H734>paths<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>.
For the <S%H3477>upright<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, And the <S%H8549>perfect<s%> shall remain in <S%H3498>it<s%>.
But the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%>, And the <S%H898>treacherous<s%> shall be rooted out of <S%H5255>it<s%>.
